```
make: *** [Makefile:86: /home/builder/rpmbuild/BUILD/toxic-0.13.0/build/chat.o] Error 1

error: Bad exit status from /var/tmp/rpm-tmp.8878 (%build)

```

comment_data.body: You can't build toxic master (or 0.13.0) against the toxcore 0.2.18. you need to build it against toxcore master as well.

> You can't build toxic master (or 0.13.0) against the toxcore 0.2.18. you need to build it against toxcore master as well.

Hm, collect release toxic on the non-release core branch, an extremely strange decision...

> > You can't build toxic master (or 0.13.0) against the toxcore 0.2.18. you need to build it against toxcore master as well.
> 
> Hm, collect release toxic on the non-release core branch, an extremely strange decision...

Yes, it's not ideal. However c-toxcore hasn't had an update in nearly two years, and there were many important new features and bug fixes that needed to be released. Toxic will make a new release when c-toxcore gets its next update.
May be c-toxcore update to release?
https://github.com/TokTok/c-toxcore/milestone/48 is the list of tasks to do before we can release.

title: Build v0.13.0 crashes
